title: Bug 121682: Exception throws when exporting data from table containing highlight/map
description: Description: Exception throws when exporting data from attached report.
OB: When attempting to export data from a table that contains a highlight rule and/or a map rule in the group row, an exception is thrown.
EB: Data export should not cause exceptions when the table contains a highlight rule and/or a map rule in the group row.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a table to the report that has a group row with a highlight rule and/or a map rule.
2. Preview the attached report.
3. Attempt to export the data from the table and observe the exception being thrown.
